column4: ok.. i have a 64 bit processor but i'm running a normal KUbuntu on it... i got an
ATI CaRD and want to install drivers .. which ones should I install
the ones for x86 or x86_64?
the x86 drivers, unless you installed the 64-bit OS.
i did that... but theres a slight problem... my UT wont rtun normally .. i dont think the drivers are helping
also... my XOrg shows I have some Radeon x300 series Display adapter but thats not listed on the ATI site
in that case, the ATI driver won't work.  Can you go back to the driver the install defaulted to?
i guess....
you think the default driver is better suited for the game?
I don't know.  I don't have an ATI card.  Have a look at the ATI howto on the wiki ( https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI)
whats the command to stop gdm again?
sudo killall gdm
and to start it back up?
sh /etc/init.d/gdm start
could you give me that WIKI how to link again plz?
which one?
the ATI How To
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI
the bot gave me 2 links...
i want the other one too lol
http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=24557&page=1&pp=10
